focuspoint: Can be selected from 11 focus points
accessoryshoe: ISO 518 hot-shoe with sync and data contacts and safety lock
nikoncreativelightingsystemcls: Advanced Wireless Lighting supported with SB-910, SB-900, SB-800, or SB-700 as a master flash and SB-600 or SB-R200 as remotes, or SU-800 as commander; Flash Color Information Communication supported with all CLS-compatible flash units.
weight: Approx. 505 g (1 lb 1.8 oz) with battery and memory card but without body cap; approx. 455 g/1 lb (camera body only)
liveviewautofocus: Contrast-detect AF anywhere in frame (camera selects focus point automatically when face-priority AF or subject-tracking AF is selected)
filesystem: DCF (Design Rule for Camera File System) 2.0, DPOF (Digital Print Order Format), Exif (Exchangeable Image File Format for Digital Still Cameras) 2.3, PictBridge
metering: TTL exposure metering using 420-pixel RGB sensor
flashmode: Auto, auto with red-eye reduction, auto slow sync, auto slow sync with red-eye reduction, fill-flash, red-eye reduction, slow sync, slow sync with red-eye reduction, rear-curtain with slow sync, rear-curtain sync, off
liveviewafareamode: Face-priority AF, wide-area AF, normal-area AF, subject-tracking AF
movieautomaticsceneselection: Available in auto and auto (flash off) modes
monitor: 7.5-cm/3-in., approx. 921k-dot (VGA) TFT LCD with 160 ° viewing angle, approx. 100% frame coverage, and brightness adjustment
liveviewlensservo: Autofocus (AF): Single-servo AF (AF-S); full-time servo AF (AF-F) Manual focus (MF)
isosensitivityrecommendedexposureindex: ISO 100 - 6400 in steps of 1 EV; can also be set to approx. 1 EV above ISO 6400 (ISO 12800 equivalent); auto ISO sensitivity control available
media: SD (Secure Digital) and UHS-I compliant SDHC and SDXC memory cards
movieframesizepixelsandframerate: 1,920 x 1,080, 30 p (progressive)/25p/24p, (fine)high/normal 1,280 x 720, 60p/50p, (fine)high/normal 640 x 424, 30p/25p, (fine)high/normal Frame rates of 30p (actual frame rate 29.97 fps) and 60p (actual frame rate 59.94 fps) are available when NTSC is selected for video mode. 25p and 50p are available when PAL is selected for video mode. Actual frame rate when 24p is selected is 23.976 fps.
moviemetering: TTL exposure metering using main image sensor
magnification: Approx. 0.8 x (50 mm f/1.4 lens at infinity, -1.0 m-1)
playback: Full-frame and thumbnail (4, 9, or 72 images or calendar) playback with playback zoom, movie playback, photo and/or movie slide shows, histogram display, highlights, auto image rotation, and image comment (up to 36 characters)
shutterflashsyncspeed: X=1/200 s; synchronizes with shutter at 1/200 s or slower
autofocus: Nikon Multi-CAM 1000 autofocus sensor module with TTL phase detection, 11 focus points (including one cross-type sensor), and AF-assist illuminator (range approx. 0.5 - 3 m/1 ft 8 in. - 9 ft 10 in.)
meteringmethod: Matrix metering: 3D color matrix metering II (type G and D lenses); color matrix metering II (other CPU lenses) Center-weighted metering: Weight of 75% given to 8-mm circle in center of frame Spot metering: Meters 3.5-mm circle (about 2.5% of frame) centered on selected focus point
lensservo: Autofocus (AF): Single-servo AF (AF-S); continuous-servo AF (AF-C); auto AF-S/AF-C selection (AF-A); predictive focus tracking activated automatically according to subject status Manual focus (MF): Electronic rangefinder can be used
accessoryterminal: Remote cord: MC-DC2 (available separately) GPS unit: GP-1 (available separately)
movieaudiorecordingdevice: Built-in monaural or external stereo microphone; sensitivity adjustable
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (Portugal and Brazil), Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian
releasemode: Single frame, Continuous, Self-timer, Delayed remote, Quick-response remote, Quiet shutter release
picturecontrolsystem: Standard, Neutral, Vivid, Monochrome, Portrait, Landscape; selected Picture Control can be modified
builtinflash: Auto, portrait, child, close up, night portrait: Auto flash with auto pop-up P, S, A, M: Manual pop-up with button release
focuslock: Focus can be locked by pressing shutter-release button halfway (single-servo AF) or by pressing AE-L/AF-L button
frameadvancerate: Up to 4 fps (manual focus, mode M or S, shutter speed 1/250 s or faster, and other settings at default values)
effectiveangleofview: Approx. 1.5 x lens focal length (35 mm format equivalent); Nikon DX format)
focusingscreen: Type B BriteView Clear Matte Mark VII screen
fileformat: NEF (RAW): 12 bit, compressed JPEG: JPEG-Baseline compliant with fine (approx. 1 : 4), normal (approx. 1 : 8), or basic (approx. 1 : 16) compression NEF (RAW)+JPEG: Single photograph recorded in both NEF (RAW) and JPEG formats
acadapter: EH-5b AC adapter; requires EP-5A power connector (available separately)
afareamode: Single-point AF, dynamic-area AF, auto-area AF, 3D-tracking (11 points)
shutterspeed: 1/4000 - 30 s in steps of 1/3 EV; Bulb; Time (requires optional ML-L3 remote control)
rangeiso100f14lens20c68f: Matrix or center-weighted metering: 0 - 20 EV Spot metering: 2 - 20 EV
eyepoint: 18 mm (-1.0m-1; from center surface of viewfinder eyepiece lens)
flashreadyindicator: Lights when built-in flash or optional flash unit is fully charged; flashes after flash is fired at full output
compatiblelenses: Autofocus is available with AF-S and AF-I lenses. Autofocus is not available with other type G and D lenses, AF lenses (IX NIKKOR and lenses for the F3AF are not supported), and AI-P lenses. Non-CPU lenses can be used in mode M, but the camera exposure meter will not function. The electronic rangefinder can be used with lenses that have a maximum aperture of f/5.6 or faster.
retouchfunctions: D-lighting, red-eye correction, trim, monochrome, color balance, image overlay, resize, RAW processing (D-lighting available), filter effects (skylight, warm filter, red/green/blue intensifier, cross screen, soft), miniature effect, quick retouch, straighten, distortion control, fisheye, perspective control, color outline, color sketch, selective color, side-by-side comparison, edit movie (choose start/end point/save selected frame)
movieisosensitivity: ISO 200 - 6400; can also be set to approx. 1 EV above ISO 6400 (ISO 12800 equivalent)
mode: Auto modes (auto; auto (flash off)); scene modes (portrait; landscape; child; sports; close up; night portrait); programmed auto with flexible program (P); shutter-priority auto (S); aperture-priority auto (A); manual (M)
exposurelock: Luminosity locked at detected value with AE-L/AF-L button
dustreductionsystem: Image sensor cleaning, Image Dust Off reference data (optional Capture NX 2 software required)
whitebalance: Auto, incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual, all except preset manual with fine-tuning.
flashcontrol: TTL: i-TTL flash control using 420-pixel RGB sensor is available with built-in flash and SB-910, SB-900, SB-800, SB-700, SB-600, or SB-400; i-TTL balanced fill-flash for digital SLR is used with matrix and center-weighted metering, standard i-TTL flash for digital SLR with spot metering
